# init(rawValue:)

**Initializer**

Initializes a set that contains the specified days of the week.

## Declaration

```swift
init(rawValue: UInt)
```

## Parameters

- **rawValue**: The numeric value that represents the day or days for the set to contain.
title: init(rawValue:)
